intent: Look up the tour about how to use the 'pipeline' feature in the Hugging Face Transformers library for sentiment analysis, and identify the default model it uses.

reference_answers.fuzzy_match: from transformers import pipeline \n classifier = pipeline("sentiment-analysis") \n classifier("We are very happy to show you the 🤗 Transformers library.") ... distilbert/distilbert-base-uncased-finetuned-sst-2-english
